name: School Simulator: Fears of Forest Hill
name_original: School Simulator: Fears of Forest Hill
description:
Lighting strikes, and rain hails down hard on the roof of Forest Hill High. You are stuck in detention, for a crime you did not commit. The halls are empty, and all faculty has left, but strangely, the silky voice of Frank Sinatra echoes over the school loudspeakers. You need to find a way out as soon as possible, because something feels.... off. But as you embark on your escape, the deepest and darkest secrets of the school threaten to take hold of you without letting go, and you realize you aren't the only one walking the hallways.....

To be involved in the production of this game, or just to get updates, join the discord server! 

https://discord.gg/meQCRSrP6A

File currently uploaded is very early beta testing, and it is just to test performance, spawning, and basic mechanics. It is also kinda a joke, but it does test the animation and locked door mechanics further.
